00063                         $this->PageComposerUtilities = get_package( 'page::page_composer_utilities' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00090             function                pre_generation( $Options )
00091             {
00092                   try
00093                   {
00094                         $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'jstree' , get_package_version_s( __CLASS__ ) );
00095                         
00096                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->add_javascript( "{http_host}/$PackagePath/include/js/jquery.jstree.js" );
00097                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->add_javascript( "{http_host}/$PackagePath/include/js/jquery.jstree.buttons.js" );
00098                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->add_javascript( 
00099                               "{http_host}/$PackagePath/include/js/jquery.jstree.autorun.default.js"
00100                         );
00101                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->add_javascript( "{http_host}/$PackagePath/include/js/jquery.jstree.extractor.js" );
00102                         
00103                         $Lang = get_package( 'lang' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00104                         $Lang->include_strings_js( 'jstree' );
00105                   }
00106                   catch( Exception $e )
00107                   {
00108                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00130             function    view( $Options )
00131             {
00132                   try
00133                   {
00134                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'tree_control' , false ) )
00135                         {
00136                               $ComponentHTML = '{tree_control:'.$Options->get_all_settings().'}';
00137                               $Changed = false;
00138                               $ComponentHTML = $this->process_string( $Options , $ComponentHTML , $Changed );
00139                               return( $ComponentHTML );
00140                         }
00141                         
00142                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'tree_control_buttons' , false ) )
00143                         {
00144                               $ComponentHTML = '{tree_control_buttons:'.$Options->get_all_settings().'}';
00145                               $Changed = false;
00146                               $ComponentHTML = $this->process_string( $Options , $ComponentHTML , $Changed );
00147                               return( $ComponentHTML );
00148                         }
00149                         
00150                         return( '' );
00151                   }
00152                   catch( Exception $e )
00153                   {
00154                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00155                   }
00156             }
00157             
00188             function                process_tree_control( &$Options , $Str , $Changed )
00189             {
00190                   try
00191                   {
00192                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'tree_control' ) ; )
00193                         {
00194                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00195                               $Selector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' , false );
00196                               if( $Selector === false )
00197                               {
00198                                     $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'jstree' , get_package_version_s( __CLASS__ ) );
00199                                     $this->PageComposerUtilities->add_javascript( 
00200                                           "{http_host}/$PackagePath/include/js/jquery.jstree.autorun.default.js"
00201                                     );
00202                                     $Control = '';
00203                               }
00204                               else
00205                               {
00206                                     $Control = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'tree_control.tpl' );
00207                                     $Control = str_replace( '{selector}' , $Selector );
00208                               }
00209                               $Str = str_replace( "{tree_control:$MacroParameters}" , $Control , $Str );
00210                               $Changed = true;
00211                         }
00212                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00213                   }
00214                   catch( Exception $e )
00215                   {
00216                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00217                   }
00218             }
00219             
00250             function                process_tree_control_buttons( &$Options , $Str , $Changed )
00251             {
00252                   try
00253                   {
00254                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
00255                                                                         $Str , 'tree_control_buttons' ) ; )
00256                         {
00257                               $Control = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'tree_control_buttons.tpl' );
00258                               $Control = str_replace( 
00259                                     '{tree_control_selector}' , $Options->get_setting( 'tree_control_selector' , '.tree_control' ) , 
00260                                     $Control 
00261                               );
00262                               $Control = str_replace( 
00263                                     '{direct_category}' , $Options->get_setting( 'direct_category' , '14' ) , $Control
00264                               );
00265                               $Control = $this->String->print_record( $Control , $Options );
00266                               $Str = str_replace( "{tree_control_buttons:$MacroParameters}" , $Control , $Str );
00267                               $Changed = true;
00268                         }
00269                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00270                   }
00271                   catch( Exception $e )
00272                   {
00273                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00274                   }
00275             }
00276             
00307             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00308             {
00309                   try
00310                   {
00311                         $MacroParameters = '';
00312                         
00313                         $Str = str_replace( '{tree_control}' , '{tree_control:p=1}' , $Str );
00314                         
00315                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_tree_control( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00316                         
00317                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_tree_control_buttons( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00318                         
00319                         return( $Str );
00320                   }
00321                   catch( Exception $e )
00322                   {
00323                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00324                   }
00325             }
00326       }
